radiographic_examinations.findings: The liver is diffusely echogenic with focal sparing adjacent to the gallbladder fossa. The contour of the liver is smooth. There is no focal liver mass. The main portal vein is patent with hepatopetal flow. There is no ascites. No intrahepatic biliary dilation. The CBD measures 4 mm. Multiple gallstones are seen near the gallbladder fundus. The gallbladder is distended but not hydropic. No stones are seen near the gallbladder neck. No evidence of hydronephrosis in the right kidney. Visualized portions of aorta and IVC are within normal limits.
